revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: List of the irrigation of the olive-yards;Eudas, inhabitant of Sathro: 8 drachmai, 1 obol;To Papion, the sailor;Kephalion, sitologos: [.] drachmai, 1 obol;Anchorimphis, sitologos: 2 drachmai;Chairas, praktor: 4 drachmai;Herakleidion, son of Sambathion, sitologos: [.] drachmai;Didymos, sitologos of Karanis: [.] drachmai;... secretary of the toparches: [.] drachmai 3 obols;Ma[ ] gymnasiarch: 4 drachmai;Didas ibiostolistes: 4 drachmai;Herakleidion, son of Saokiaibis: 4 drachmai;Protion gymnasiarch: 4 drachmai;Charition, wife of Skylax: [.] drachmai;...: [.] drachmai;..., son of Diodoros: [.] drachmai;..., son of Dromeus: 4 drachmai;and the brother: [.] drachmai

listBibl.bibl: Grenfell BP-Hunt AS-Hogarth DG, PFay, 246 description, 1900 Sijpesteijn PJ, Aegyptus 67, 74-76, 1987 -- SB XVIII 13144
